edges.from: Show Vault Secret using Environment Property

edges.to: Show Vault Secret using Environment Property

offsets.name: Show Vault Secret using Environment Property

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

properties.scriptBody:
#!/bin/bash

# Export your cluster's public URL and the default namespace called admin
export VAULT_ADDR="https://rlange-sample-cluster-public-vault-7d2aca42.70100e2c.z1.hashicorp.cloud:8200";
export VAULT_NAMESPACE="admin"


# Authenticate to Vault using AppRole and save the resulting client token to interact with the cluster
export VAULT_TOKEN=$(curl -s --header "X-Vault-Namespace: $VAULT_NAMESPACE" \
    --request POST --data '{"role_id": "aae6fc26-d0cd-c6f5-056f-8d83e306ee75", "secret_id": "09c654e0-8a81-7082-187a-70f403d128e3"}' \
     $VAULT_ADDR/v1/auth/approle/login | jq -r '.auth.client_token' )

# read your first secret

curl -s --header "X-Vault-Token: $VAULT_TOKEN" \
    --header "X-Vault-Namespace: $VAULT_NAMESPACE" \
    $VAULT_ADDR/v1/secret/data/sample-secret | jq -r ".data"
